as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labour unions. Sergio Marchionne praised the`` courage'' of workers who gave their approval. Saying yes to flexibility makes it possible to achieve very high production levels, of up to 280,000 vehicles per year, and also open the way for the potential creation of jobs, Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` In a country such as Italy, which has always been tied to the past and reluctant to change... those who voted yes showed vision,'' he said.

We elected a human being, Barack Obama , who came in with an idea, with energy, and I think with a more youthful approach to things. Barack Obama has stabilized the U.S. economy, taken on health care and improved U.S. relations with other nations, Colin Powell said, calling last week's visit to Washington by China Barack Obama Hu Jintao `` very successful.''

will be the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist. friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added.
